title: Aamir Khan Hires A Famous Trainer For Dangal
text:
Posted by: Vinod D'souza Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 18:46 [IST] 
Aamir Khan , has invited a new trainer for Dangal , and the man is none other than Mahesh Bhatt 's son Rahul Bhatt. Aamir Khan personally invited Rahul Bhatt to be his trainer for his upcoming movie on wrestling.A source close to the movie says, "He knows Rahul from the time he (Rahul) was a child hanging around on his dad Mahesh Bhatt Saab's set of Dil Hai Ki Manta Nahin. Rahul grew up to be one of the finest physical trainers in Mumbai. So when Aamir needed to develop two distinct body types for his wrestler's character, he immediately thought of Rahul."Right after receiving an invitation from Aamir Khan, Rahul Bhatt flew to Ludhiana, Punjab and is stationed along with the actor at a posh hotel. Aamir Khan, has signed Rahul Bhatt for a 90-day contract for Dangal , and Aamir wants him to be his personal physical trainer after the shoot is over. 
A source was quoted as saying, "Aamir trains with Rahul for approximately 90 minutes every day. It is very intense training. The rigorous exercises involve Myofibril-based strength work-outs. Aamir Khan is first training with Rahul for his bulky look when his character is 45-years old. Then later he needs to train to look 25. For both the looks, Rahul Bhatt has worked out a very strict and focused exercise regime for Aamir." Aamir Khan Hires A Famous Trainer For Dangal 1/9
